src:
Prediksi Persib Bandung vs PSIS Semarang 6 November 2019
06 Nov 2019, 10:17 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persib Bandung akan menjamu PSIS Semarang pada pekan ke-27 Shopee Liga 1 2019, Rabu (6/11/2019). Pertandingan ini akan digelar di Stadion Si Jalak Harupat, Soreang.
Persib saat ini menempati peringkat 8 dengan perolehan 34 poin dari 25 pertandingan (M8 S10 K7). Sementara itu, PSIS berada di posisi 13 dengan 28 poin dari 25 laga (M7 S7 K11).
Kedua tim sama-sama sedang diliputi kepercayaan diri dan sama-sama ingin melanjutkan tren positif. Pelatih Persib, Roberts Alberts, pun memastikan pertemuan tim asuhannya kontra PSIS akan berjalan menarik.
"Pertandingan bakal menarik karena PSIS tim tangguh dengan penyerangan yang berbahaya dan mempunyai pemain asing sangat bagus," ujar Robert.
text:
Prediction Persib Bandung vs PSIS Semarang 6 November 2019
Nov 6, 2019, 10:17 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persib Bandung will host PSIS Semarang in the 27th week of Shopee Liga 1 2019, Wednesday (11/06/2019). This match will be held at Si Jalak Harupat Stadium, Soreang.
Persib is currently ranked 8th with 34 points from 25 matches (M8 S10 K7). Meanwhile, PSIS is in 13th position with 28 points from 25 matches (M7 S7 K11).
Both teams are both being overwhelmed with confidence and both want to continue the positive trend. Persib coach, Roberts Alberts, also ensured that his team's counter-PSIS meeting would be interesting.
"The match will be interesting because PSIS is a tough team with dangerous attacks and has very good foreign players," Robert said.
